segments.text: I see the woman so absorbed in her dish drying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kitchen light is soft from the window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Suddenly, the sink overflows, shocking me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water cascades down, but she doesn't flinch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron's getting wet, poor thing unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To the side, the boy's adventure on the stool catches my eye.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretching for the cookie jar, full of determination.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool wobbles dangerously, oh dear.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister reaches up, eyes wide with excitement.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're plotting this cookie heist so cutely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the wet floor could make them slip too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside seems worlds away from this frenzy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope it all turns out fine somehow.
segments.speaker: PAR
